00027 #ifndef MOBILAB_SIGNAL_HPP
00028 #define MOBILAB_SIGNAL_HPP
00029 
00030 #include <stdint.h>
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <Windows.h>
00033 #include "gmobilabplus.h"
00034 #include "ISignal.hpp"
00035 #include "ITimer.hpp"
00036 
00037 class MobilabSignal : public ISignal {
00038 public:
00039         MobilabSignal(ITimer* pTimer, int32_t ain, int32_t dio, std::string port);
00040         ~MobilabSignal();
00041         virtual bool open(uint8_t*);
00042         virtual bool init(size_t channels);
00043     virtual size_t channels();
00044         virtual bool start();
00045         virtual size_t acquire();
00046         virtual void getdata(uint32_t* data, size_t samples);
00047     virtual uint64_t timestamp();
00048         virtual bool stop();
00049         virtual bool close();
00050 private:
00051     ITimer* mpTimer;
00052     HANDLE mpGtec;
00053         int16_t* mpBuffer;
00054     _BUFFER_ST mDatBuffer;
00055         OVERLAPPED mEventHandler;
00056     std::string mPort;

00059     int32_t mDio;
00060 };
